Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Westbound Reroute near Foster/Cicero
ShortDescription: Westbound 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Elston and Foster: due to street blockage near Foster/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Elston and Foster: due to street blockage near Foster/Cicero.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute at  Austin/Cortland
ShortDescription: #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Austin, Grand, Central, North Avenue and Austin, due to street blockage near Austin/Cortland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Austin, Grand, Central, North Avenue and Austin, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Austin/Cortland.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Chicago
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Chicago due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Chicago due to a mechanical problem. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
